collection:
When you visit Guru.com you provide two types of information: personal
information you knowingly choose to disclose that is collected by Guru.com and
website use information collected by Guru.com as you interact with the
Guru.com website (the "Website").

When you register with Guru.com as a Freelancer or as an Employer, you provide
certain personal information, including, your name, your email address and
your address.

Additionally, when you establish your profile as a Freelancer or
as an Employer you will provide information relating to your skills,
experience, education level, compensation, work availability, geographic
region and self-evaluation.
When you enter the Website, Guru.com collects your IP address.

This
information is gathered for all Guru.com visitors.

In addition, Guru.com
stores certain information from your browser using "cookies."

By default, Guru.com
uses a persistent cookie that stores your login ID (but not your password) to
make it easier for you to login when you return to the Website.
Guru.com is the sole owner of the information collected through the Website.
Guru.com records IP addresses for system administration purposes.

IP addresses are not linked to personally
identifiable information and are only used to gather broad demographic
information for aggregate use, except in the case of fraud.

For your protection and the protection of all of our users, we may ask you to
provide proof of identity before we can answer the above requests.

### Google Analytics, Google Ads, and Firebase

Google Analytics is a web analytics service offered by Google that tracks and
reports website traffic.

Google uses the data collected to track and monitor
the use of Guru.com.

We use Google Analytics tracking to review visitor
website activities and information, including page views, source, time spent
on our website, demographics, and interests.

Additionally, we use the User ID
extension for Google Analytics to help associate multiple sessions with a
unique ID.

Using Google Analytics, we learn how to give you a
better visitor experience.

We use Google Analytics and Google Ads Remarketing features to log when
visitors view specific web pages.

We may also collect information when you access our service via a **mobile**
device ("usage data").

When you access our service via a mobile device, this
usage data may include information such as the type of mobile device you use,
your mobile device unique ID, the IP address of your mobile device, your
mobile operating system, the type of mobile browser you use, unique device
identifiers and other diagnostic data.

We collect and use this data **in
aggregate form** to provide and maintain our service, to gather analysis to
improve our service, to monitor the usage of our service, and to detect,
prevent, and address technical issues.

When you download a Guru app, Guru may use the following services to collect
and analyze customer data **in an aggregate and non-personalized format** :
Cloud Functions for Firebase, Firebase Authentication, Firebase Cloud
Messaging, Firebase Crash Reporting, Firebase Crashlytics, Google Analytics
for Firebase, Firebase Dynamic Links, Firebase Hosting, Firebase Performance
Monitoring, Firebase Predictions, Firebase Realtime Database, Firebase, Remote
Config, and ML Kit for Firebase.

This privacy statement applies solely to
information collected by Guru.com.

Our Privacy Policy also gives our users the scope of the data
collected and use of that data collected on Guru.com.

Please review the Terms of Service and Privacy
Policy for the Social Login you may be using to determine the collection and
usage of data per the previously mentioned Social Login services you may be
using.
